name: Jump, Die, Repeat
description:
Jump, Die, Repeat

Jump on your own dead bodies to reach the exit! Make a pile of your corpses and block turrets from shooting you! In Jump, Die, Repeat, you have to strategically die to solve puzzles and reach the exit. Go through 9 different levels, with their own difficulty and mechanics.

Want more challenges? Speedrun the levels and share your personal bests in the comments!

~ 15 min playtime

Controls
  • Q  D or ← → to move
  • Space to jump
  • F to kill yourself
  • Click on bodies to remove them
  • Escape to pause the game
Credits
  • AJ Paglia for the font
  • Jonas discord server for being supportive
  • You for playing ♥
Links

Youtube channel

This game is part of the Wowie Jam 3.0, it was made in 2.5 days.
